動物用藥品名稱: 西華雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病、里奧病毒感染症不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 法商西華股份有限公司台灣分公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病、里奧病毒感染症。
ingredients: ACH DOSE(0.5ML) CONTAINS：INACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS, B1 TYPE LA SOTASTRAIN................................................MIN 10^8.8 EID50INACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATED INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS, MASS TYPESTRAIN M41............................................MIN 10^6.1 EID50INACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATED INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS, MASS TYPESTRAIN H52............................................MIN 10^6.1 EID50INACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATED BURSAL DISEASE VIRUS, STANDARD SEROTYPE 1LUKERT STRAIN.........................................MIN 10^5.1 EID50INACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATED REOVIRUS STRAIN S1133...MIN 10^5.42 EID50INACTIVATED AND CONCENTRATED REOVIRUS STRAIN 2408....MIN 10^5.67 EID50DEIONIZED WATER QS TO 45%、OIL ADJUVANT 55%、GLYCINE MAX 7 G/L、PRESERVATIVE：THIMEROSAL MAX 0.1 G/L、FORMALDEHYDE MAX 0.74 G/L、GENTAMICIN MAX 30 μG/ML、AMPHOTERICIN B MAX 2.5 μG/ML
